rev.comment: /* (Dec 2005 - Present) The Future of Van Halen */
Removed some random characters from the beginning of a paragraph.
/* Influence on culture, music and business */
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/68.160.24.236|68.160.24.236]] ([[User talk:68.160.24.236|talk]]) to last version by 69.181.243.144
/* (Dec 2005 - Present) Hiatus Again... */ - Fixed bunch of typos.
The Anthony interview cleary states he was not initially asked to be part of the reunion tour.
remove premature addition of good article tag. [[Wikipedia_talk:WikiProject_Good_articles#The good article tag on main article space|see]] using [[Wikipedia:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
Reverted: Let's not do wholesale removals of the narrative and call them edits. We need copy-editing not cutting.
/* Notes */ cleaned up footnotes and added a citation
/* Origins */ added citation for early Van Halen history
Reverted edits - no evidence or public announcements about Michael Anthony being "out" of Van Halen
Added citation for Mitch Malloy interview
/* Notes */ added citation for Michael Anthony's revelations about the band 2006
/* (Dec 2005 - Present) Hiatus Again... */ citation to Michael Anthony revelations
/* (Dec 2005 - Present) Hiatus Again... */ moved picture of EVH to his own page, keep band pictures on the band page
/* External links */ remove links to categories
/* (2004-2005) Reunion with Sammy Hagar */ reformat footnote 17
/* (2000-2004) Four years of silence */ reformat footnote 16
/* (1997-1999) with Gary Cherone */ reformatting footnote #15 to fit convention
/* Notes */ removing notation for Michael Anthony
/* Origins */ Taking out citation for MA & EVH singing leads in Mammoth.. no factual link just an opinion
/* Origins */ Added citation for the band Snake
disambiguation from [[Heavy metal]] to [[Heavy metal music]] - ([[WP:DPL|You can help!]])

/* Influence on culture, music and business */
/* See also */ pages to be deleted
Pointed links to M&Ms to M&M's.
